attributes.action: scrap the compulsion to purchase an annuity by age 75
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a citizen has saved sensibly all his working life into a Private Pension Scheme and managed the fund well until age 75 and it has grown to say £200,000. Why should he or she be forced by Gordon Brown to now purchase an annuity where if they die the annuity company keeps the balance of the fund in exchange for a paltry annuity rate during their short lifetime after age 75

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
